Verses: 1 eppiraayeem Malaiththesaththilirukkira Soppeem Ennappatta Raamadhaayeem Ooraanaakiya Oru Manushan Irundhaan; Avanukku Elkkaanaa Endru Per; Avan Eppiraayeemiyanaakiya Sooppukkup Pirandha Thokuvin Kumaaranaakiya Elikoovin Makanaana Erokaamin Puththiran.
2 avanukku Irantu Manaivikal Irundhaarkal; Oruththiper Annaal, Matravalper Peninnaal; Peninnaalukkup Pillaikal Irundhaarkal; Annaalukko Pillai Illai.

3 andha Manushan Seelovile Senaikalin Karththaraip Panindhu Kollavum Avarukkup Paliyitavum Varushandhorum Than Oorilirundhu Poivaruvaan; Angekarththarin Aasaariyaraana Eliyin Irantu Kumaararaakiya Opniyum Pinekaasum Irundhaarkal.
4 ange Elkkaanaa Paliyitum Naalile, Avan Than Manaiviyaakiya Peninnaalukkum, Avalutaiya Ellaak Kumaararukkum Kumaaraththikalukkum, Pangu Pottuk Kotuppaan.
5 annaalaich Chinekiththapatiyinaal, Avalukku Irattippaana Pangu Kotuppaan; Karththaro Aval Karppaththai Ataiththirundhaar.
6 karththar Aval Karppaththai Ataiththapatiyinaal, Avalutaiya Sakkalaththi Aval Thukkappatumpatiyaaka Avalai Mikavum Visanappatuththuvaal.
7 aval Karththarutaiya Aalayaththirkup Pokum Samayaththil, Avan Varushandhorum Andhappirakaaramaaich Cheyvaan; Ival Avalai Manamativaakkuvaal; Appozhudhu Aval Saappitaamal Azhudhukontiruppaal.
8 avan Purushanaakiya Elkkaanaa Avalaip Paarththu: Annaale, En Azhukiraai? En Saappitaadhirukkiraai? En Sanjalappatukiraai? Paththuk Kumaararaippaarkkilum Naan Unakku Adhikamallavaa Endraan.
9 seelovile Avarkal Pusiththuk Kutiththapinpu, Annaal Ezhundhirundhaal; Aasaariyanaakiya Eli Karththarutaiya Aalayaththin Vaasal Nilaiyantaiyile Oru Aasanaththinmel Utkaarndhirundhaan.
10 aval Poi, Manangasandhu, Mikavum Azhudhu, Karththarai Nokki Vinnappampanni:

11 senaikalin Karththaave, Thevareer Ummutaiya Atiyaalin Sirumaiyaik Kannokkip Paarththu, Ummutaiya Atiyaalai Maravaamal Ninaindharuli, Umadhu Atiyaalukku Oru Aanpillaiyaik Kotuththaal, Avan Uyirotirukkum Sakala Naalum Naan Avanaik Karththarukku Oppukkotuppen; Avan Thalaiyinmel Savarakan Kaththi Patuvadhillai Endru Oru Poruththanai Panninaal.
12 aval Karththarutaiya Sannidhiyil Vekuneram Vinnappampannukirapodhu, Eli Aval Vaayaik Kavaniththukkontirundhaan.
13 annaal Than Irudhayaththile Pesinaal; Avalutaiya Udhatukal Maaththiram Asaindhadhu, Aval Saththamo Ketkappatavillai; Aakaiyaal Aval Veriththirukkiraal Endru Eli Ninaiththu,
14 avalai Nokki: Nee Edhuvaraikkum Veriththiruppaai? Un Kutiyai Unnaivittu Vilakku Endraan.

15 adharku Annaal Piradhiyuththaramaaka: Appatiyalla, En Aantavane, Naan Manakkilesamulla Sdhiree; Naan Thiraatcharasamaakilum Madhuvaakilum Kutikkavillai; Naan Karththarutaiya Sannidhiyil En Irudhayaththai Ootrivitten.
16 ummutaiya Atiyaalaip Peliyaalin Makalaaka Ennaadheyum; Mikudhiyaana Visaaraththinaalum Kilesaththinaalum Inneramattum Vinnappam Panninen Endraal.
17 adharku Eli Samaadhaanaththutane Po; Nee Isravelin Thevanitaththil Ketta Un Vinnappaththinpati Avar Unakkuk Kattalaiyituvaaraaka Endraan.
18 appozhudhu Aval: Ummutaiya Atiyaalukku Ummutaiya Kankalile Thayaikitaikkakkatavadhu Endraal; Pinpu Andha Sdhiree Purappattuppoi, Pojananjeydhaal; Appuram Aval Thukkamukamaayirukkavillai.

19 avarkal Adhikaalaiyil Ezhundhu, Karththaraip Panindhukontu, Raamaavilirukkira Thangal Veettukkuth Thirumpipponaarkal; Elkkaanaa Thanmanaiviyaakiya Annaalai Arindhaan; Karththar Avalai Ninaindharulinaar.
20 silanaal Sendrapinpu Annaal Karppavadhiyaaki, Oru Kumaaranaip Petru, Karththaritaththil Avanaik Ketten Endru Solli, Avanukku Saamuvel Endru Perittaal.
21 elkkaanaa Enpavan Karththarukku Varushaandharam Seluththum Paliyaiyum Than Poruththanaiyaiyum Seluththumpatiyaaka, Than Veettaar Anaivarotungootap Ponaan.

22 annaal Kootappokavillai; Aval: Pillai Paalmarandha Pinpu, Avan Karththarin Sannidhiyile Kaanappatavum, Ange Eppozhudhum Irukkavum, Naan Avanaik Kontupoi Vituven Endru Than Purushanitaththil Sonnaal.

23 appozhudhu Aval Purushanaakiya Elkkaanaa Avalai Nokki: Nee Un Ishtappati Seydhu, Avanaip Paal Marakkappannumattum Iru; Karththar Thammutaiya Vaarththaiyaimaaththiram Niraivetruvaaraaka Endraan; Appatiye Andha Sdhiree Than Pillaiyaip Paal Marakkappannumattum Adharku Mulaikotuththaal.

24 aval Avanaip Paalmarakkappanninapinpu, Moondru Kaalaikalaiyum, Oru Marakkaal Maavaiyum, Oru Thuruththi Thiraatcharasaththaiyum Etuththukkontu, Avanaiyum Koottik Kontu, Seelovilirukkira Karththarutaiya Aalayaththukkup Ponaal; Pillai Innum Kuzhandhaiyaayirundhadhu.
25 avarkal Oru Kaalaiyaip Paliyittu, Pillaiyai Eliyinitaththil Kontuvandhu Vittaarkal.
26 appozhudhu Aval: En Aantavane, Inge Ummantaiyile Nindru Karththarai Nokki Vinnappampannina Sdhiree Naan Thaan Endru En Aantavanaakiya Ummutaiya Jeevanaikkontu Sollukiren.
27 indhap Pillaikkaaka Vinnappampanninen; Naan Karththaritaththil Ketta En Vinnappaththinpati Enakkuk Kattalaiyittaar.
28 aakaiyaal Avan Karththarukkendru Ketkappattapatiyinaal, Avan Uyirotirukkum Sakala Naalum Avanaik Karththarukke Oppukkotukkiren Endraal; Avan Ange Karththaraip Panindhukontaan.
